name: Move your app forward with the Associated Press API

members.name: search_news
members.description: Search news by keywords. Optionally refine search by category, source, data range, etc.

params.name: search_term
params.description: The keyword or keywords to search for (required)

params.name: start_dt
params.description: The optional start date for the query (required)

params.name: end_dt
params.description: The optional end date for the query (required)

params.name: limit
params.description: The maximum number of articles to return (required)

ret.description: A DataFrame of matching articles with the columns 'body', 'categories', 'headline', 'link', 'news_id', 'preview', 'published', 'relevance', 'source', and 'subcategories'
